pages.text: You might have already opened your inventory and noticed the huge pages of items sitting on the right side of your screen. You might think those are too many items, maybe not enough items, but I'd argue they're actually just enough.

$(l)$(#ffa500)Just Enough Items $(reset)is actually the name of the mod you’re looking at, and it’s main purpose is to list all the items in the game and help you navigate through them. You’ll learn how in the following chapters. $(br)Note, currently in 1.14+ $(l)JEI options haven’t been implemented yet$(reset), so don’t get confused when the wrench at the bottom of your screen does nothing. They’ll come.
